pullRequest.title: Runtime mod remapping in dev
pullRequest.bodyText:
I tried to cause as little impact to existing parts of the code as possible, this may have lead to things not being ideal.
FabricMC/fabric-loom#277 is required to export the intermediary classpath for this to remap mods against.

commit.message: First pass of runtime mod remapping in dev

Merge remote-tracking branch 'remotes/upstream/master' into dev_runtime_mod_remapping

# Conflicts:
#	src/main/java/net/fabricmc/loader/FabricLoader.java

nodes.bodyText: I think it might be worth moving access widerners out into their own lib, as all this is copyied right out of loom.
Couldn't all the methods in this class effectively be static?
